conversation.content: Hola, necesito hablar con alguien porque mi pago sigue fallando para un vuelo a Madrid.
Hi and welcome to Celestar Air. I’m Nova, your virtual flight assistant. Thanks for calling! How can I help you today?
The payment keeps failing. I think I need to speak with a person to sort it out.
Sure, I can help arrange that. Do you want me to transfer you to a Celestar Air specialist now? I’ll just need a few quick details before I connect you.
Great, I’ll get that set. Could you please provide your phone number?
Thanks. And what’s your email address so the specialist can follow up if needed?
Got it. And just to confirm, what’s the main reason for the transfer—payment issue with a new booking or an existing reservation?
It’s a payment issue with a new booking. I was trying to book SFO to Madrid on November 18, Aether Business.
Understood. This may take a moment; thanks for your patience. I’ll connect you with a Celestar Air specialist. One moment please.
Wait—before you transfer, do you need my name or anything else?
No worries, I’ve sent your details over. They’ll assist with the payment failure on the SFO to Madrid Aether Business booking for November 18.
Okay. Will they have my phone and email?
Yes, I provided your phone as +1-415-555-2940 and your email as carlos.mendaz84@gmail.com for follow-up.
That email is wrong. It’s mendez, not mendaz.
Apologies for the mix-up. I’ll correct it after I transfer you.

mistakes.incorrect guideline: Agent skipped asking for or confirming the caller’s name before transfer and implied details were sent without any name.

mistakes.evidence: Thanks. And what’s your email address so the specialist can follow up if needed?
mistakes.incorrect guideline: Agent requested the caller’s email instead of skipping or mistyping without confirmation, reflecting the incorrect guideline phase by not following it.
